#summary Eclipse Update Site for installing SWT/XML

= Eclipse Update Site =

An Eclipse Update Site for installing the Runtime and IDE plug-in in Eclipse 3.4 (for RCP/Plug-in Developers) is available at:

{{{
http://www.swtxml.com/updates/
}}}

= Packaged downloads =

Packaged downloads containing the built plug-ins and the sources are available here:

  [http://code.google.com/p/swtxml/downloads/list Downloads]

= Requirements =

 * Eclipse 3.4 for RCP/Plug-in Developers, Java 1.5 or newer
